entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 a.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 10.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 12:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SE 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4 except zero in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4 except zero in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
